div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 286 Delos, 1905 (306b) Burial: c. 128 B.C. (T); c. 88 (Hackens) Contents: 173 AR. Pot hoard from excava- tions Athens: 52 New Style tetradr. 98 New Style dr. 23 New Style triob. Disposition: Athens (except 15 which were exchanged) Svoronos, JIAN 1906, pp. 255-60 Roussel, Délos, p. 48, note 4 † Thompson, Athens (Delos Β), pp. 482-4 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516
